buddy_url.description: The URL to the Buddy workspace

verify_ssl.description: Whether to verify TLS connection to the Buddy URL

permission_set_id.description: ID of permission set that will be granted to the user

block.description:
`buddy_project_member` manages member on a Buddy project.

Member is granted access to a project using their ID and permission sets ID.

encrypted.description: Flag to decide whether variable encrypted

project.description: Project name where variable will be created

settable.description: Flag to decide whether the variable is settable by pipeline run

ssh_key.description: Flag to decide whether the variable is an SSH key

type.description: Variable type. Currently only support VAR

value_hash.description: Hash of the encrypted variable value

block.description:
`buddy_project_variable` manages variable under the project scope.

Project scoped variable is accessible to all pipelines in the project. Use this variable to store value that needed by multiple pipelines in the same project.

admin.description: Flag to indicate whether member has admin right

email.description: Email address to be invited into Buddy workspace

block.description:
`buddy_workspace_member` manages member on a Buddy workspace.

A new member can be invited into a workspace using their email address.

encrypted.description: Flag to decide whether variable encrypted

settable.description: Flag to decide whether the variable is settable by pipeline run

ssh_key.description: Flag to decide whether the variable is an SSH key

type.description: Variable type. Currently only support VAR

value_hash.description: Hash of the encrypted variable value

block.description:
`buddy_workspace_variable` manages variable under the workspace scope.

Variable under the workspace scoped is accessible by all projects under the workspace. Use this variable to store value that is needed across multiple projects.
